directions.step:
Mash ripe bananas with a fork in a big bowl. When soft, beat them with a rotary beater. Add cold milk and vanilla and beat until drink is very frothy. Dust with nutmeg. Yield: 6 servings.
From <The Progressive Farmer's Southern Country Cookbook>, by the editors of the 'Progressive Farmer Magazine'. Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
